zipperHQ wants to help you break through the noise. The daily volume of digital messages is overwhelming – and most emails make it worse. Not ours.

Video messages add that human element when connecting with prospects, customers and coworkers and make you stand above the distractions – no video expertise required!

zipperHQ is the fastest way to create and send personalized video messages at scale.

CREATE - Quickly record personalized video messages in seconds. You can record your screen, webcam or both. If you have pre-made videos, they can be uploaded instantaneously. Build out your video library as a time saver.

SEND - Share your messages instantly to contact lists or select individuals. Send videos at ease by embedding them while you compose the email using gmail.

Whether you are in sales, marketing, customer service, or any other industry, zipperHQ can work for you. Create an account on www.zipperhq.com and sign in our free zipperHQ Chrome Extension to join the video email revolution.


How it works
 1. Install the zipperHQ Chrome extension and login to an account.
 2. Record your screen or webcam Plus screen through the web browser on your computer.
3. Share videos with customers, prospects, and coworkers.
